Objective: Verify navigating to Order History page from My Account Order history link
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click 'View your order history' link
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Order History Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Order History Page

Objective: Verify navigating to Order History page from My Account right column options
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Order History in right column options
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Order History Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Order History Page

Objective: Verify all the orders are displayed in Order History Page
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Place a few orders
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Order History in right column options
Expected Result: All the orders up to date should be displayed in table
Actual Result: The User is taken to Order History Page

Objective: Verify the view functionality in Order History Page
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Place a few orders
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Order History in right column options
3) Click view button in any order
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Order details page and all the details of order should be shown
Actual Result: The User is taken to Order details page and all the details of order are shown

Objective: Verify the reorder functionality in View Order Page
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Place a few orders
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Order History in right column options
3) Click view button in any order
4) Click Reorder button (ER-01)
5) Fill all details and Click Continue (ER-02)
6) Go to Order History (ER-03)
Expected Result:
1) The User should be taken to checkout page
2) The Order should be placed
3) The reordered order shold be shown
Actual Result:
1) The User is taken to checkout page
2) The Order is not placed

Objective: Verify return functionality in View Order Page by filling mandatory fields
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Place a few orders
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Order History in right column options
3) Click view button in any order
4) Click Return button (ER-01)
5) Fill the mandatory fields and Click Continue (ER-02)
6) Go to Order History (ER-03)
Expected Result:
1) The User should be take to cancellation page
2) The Order should be returned
3) The Order status should be changed as cancelled for that order
Actual Result:
1) The User is taken to cancellation page
2) The Order is not returned

Objective: Verify return functionality in View Order Page by filling all fields
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Place a few orders
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Order History in right column options
3) Click view button in any order
4) Click Return button (ER-01)
5) Fill the all fields and Click Continue (ER-02)
6) Go to Order History (ER-03)
Expected Result:
1) The User should be take to cancellation page
2) The Order should be returned
3) The Order status should be changed as cancelled for that order
Actual Result:
1) The User is taken to cancellation page
2) The Order is added to returns page but not disappear from order history

Objective: Verify return functionality in View Order Page by leaving empty fields
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Place a few orders
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Order History in right column options
3) Click view button in any order
4) Click Return button (ER-01)
5) Clear all fields and Click Continue (ER-02)
Expected Result:
1) The User should be taken to cancellation page
2) All mandatory fields should show field level warnings
Actual Result:
1) The User is taken to cancellation page
2) All mandatory fields shows field level warnings

Objective: Verify the Order History Page functionality in all the supported environments
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Place a few orders
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Order History in right column options
3) Click View button in any order
4) Repeat from Step-1 for other environments
Expected Result: The Order History Page should work in all supported environments
Actual Result: The Order History Page works in all supported environments
